info.+content: The year is 2199. The human race has been crushed in their war with the Gamilos, driven into underground cities by the invader's assault. Scientists estimate they have only a year left. The young officers Susumu Kodai and Daisuke Shima receive a mysterious capsule from a ship that made an emergency landing on Mars and return with it to Earth. It contains humanity's last hope: the planet Iscandar on the other side of the Magellan Galaxy has the technology to defeat the Gamilos and restore the planet. The space battleship Yamato is entrusted with this task, but they have only one year before humanity ends.
#1: "Uchū Senkan Yamato" (宇宙戦艦ヤマト) by Project Yamato 2199
#2: "Best of my Love" by Rei Yasuda (eps 9-17)
"Eien ni Tataeyo Waga Hikari" (永遠に讃えよ我が光) by Akira Miyagawa
"Ginga Kōro (Uchū Funanori no Uta)" (銀河航路・宇宙船乗りの歌) by Akira Miyagawa

Out of the Forest of Memories
The Star That is Our Destination
